title: The Hitchhiker (Season 6 of 6) (Complete)
description:
The Hitchhiker (AKA) Deadly Nightmares, is a mystery anthology series that aired from 1983 to 1987 on HBO (Seasons 1-4, 39 Episodes). There is nudity in some HBO episodes. The series later moved to the USA Network from 1989 to 1991 (Seasons 5-6, 46 Episodes). The Series could be compared similar to Alfred Hitchcock, Twilight Zone & Tales from the Crypt. "Drama, Horror, Mystery, Sci-Fi, Thriller" Total of 85 Episodes minus 1 missing Episode. All are in correct Seasons and order. For Series information go here: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0085031/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1
